message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $100! It's a great deal, and I think you'll really like it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased similar products. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
I'd like to wait and see what the product is before making a decision.

Ah, I understand your caution! But let me tell you, this product is a real showstopper. It's one of the best I've got, and I think you'll be thrilled with it. I've had a lot of success with this particular product, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, at $100, it's a steal! What do you say? Are you ready to take the plunge?
I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more before committing to a purchase.

I completely understand your hesitation! But let me ask you, have you ever heard the phrase 'you get what you pay for'? At $100, this product is an incredible value. I'm not just saying that because I'm trying to sell it to you, but because I genuinely believe it's a top-notch product. And I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is - I'm willing to give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, you can return it and get a full refund. What do you say? Is that enough to convince you to take the plunge?
I'm willing to take the risk, but only because of the 30-day money-back guarantee. I'll take the product.

I'm glad you took the chance on the previous product! Now, let me introduce you to this next one. It's a great opportunity to get another fantastic product at an unbeatable price. And, as a special offer, I'll throw in a bonus item that's worth $20! That's a total value of $120 for just $100. It's a steal! Plus, I'm confident that you'll love this product just as much as the last one. What do you say? Are you ready to make another great deal?
I'm not sure if I want to buy another product without knowing its quality first. I'll pass this time.

I completely understand your hesitation! But let me tell you, this product is a real game-changer. It's not just another ordinary product - it's a limited edition item that's only available for a short time. And I'm willing to make a special offer just for you. Are you ready to take advantage of this incredible deal?
I'm not convinced by the limited edition claim and the discount. I'd rather wait and see the product's quality before making a decision.
